articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: Byju Raveendran to attend EGM that will vote on his ouster? Edtech firm says… - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Shareholders at Byju's are set to vote on Friday on a resolution brought by some investors to oust founder CEO Byju Raveendran and his family members
articles.content: Edtech platform BYJU's parent firm Think and Learn Private Limited has said that neither the company's founder and chief executive Raveendran nor any other board member will attend the extraordinary … [+2550 chars]

articles.title: Pioneering European ERS-2 satellite falls to Earth over Pacific | BBC News - BBC News
articles.description: A European satellite that pioneered many of the technologies used to monitor the planet and its climate has fallen to Earth. The two-tonne ERS-2 spacecraft b...
